p: Information was collected about the rheumatologic disease, class of bDMARD in use, duration of symptoms suggestive of CHIK after acute infection, comorbidities, smoking history, intensity of pain in the acute and chronic phases by visual analog scale (VAS) from 0 to 10, pattern of joint involvement (mono-, oligo-, or polyarticular), and possible complications or atypical manifestations in the acute phase.
